bookTitle: Twilight: The Complete Illustrated Movie Companion
bookSeries: The Twilight Saga: The Official Illustrated Movie Companion #1
Plot: Everything fans want to know about the hotly anticipated Twilight movie and much more! Designed as a celebration of the film, this lavishly illustrated paperback edition is an exclusive behind-the-scenes guide featuring full-color photos of the cast, locations, and sets, as well as storyboards, interviews, details of the special effects, and much more.
